long_description: Featuring leather uppers, durable outsoles and attractive style, the Ahnu Stanyan Shoes are great for casual wear and travel, and blending together your workday with after-hours. Attractive leather uppers feature rubber rands for protection from scuffs, and pigskin leather and synthetic mesh linings for all-day comfort. Dual-density, compression-molded EVA midsoles provide shock absorption, and feature nylon shanks for heel and arch support. Lugged outsoles feature nonmarking rubber for traction on varied surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: Featuring leather uppers, durable outsoles and attractive style, the Ahnu Stanyan Shoes are great for casual wear and travel, and blending together your workday with after-hours.
